This project is an inmobiliaria platform using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and PostgreSQL.

Style: Soft Brutalism / Minimalismo.

Colors: Background #F2EFE9, Text #2C2621.

Fonts: Sans Serif for titles (Montserrat or Syne), Monospace for technical data (Roboto Mono or Courier).

Use Monospace for prices, measures, and features.
